channel.title: I want to create my first server or atleast learn
channel.description: Okay.. For all you experts, I need help in starting to make a server and finishing it. I need help on fixing all the items, hosting, and all the other important stuff. I need someone who can help me through creating the server. I need to know how much money i need to spend. Last but not least, I need to know anything else I must know to have a successful server.

item.title: I want to create my first server or atleast learn
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

To start a server click this: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html

It doesn’t cost anything unless you are buying a VPS, which you can view the prices here http://www.vpsland.com

To have a successful server you must not be a retard.

Good luck!

Read full topic
item.source: I want to create my first server or atleast learn
